description: A series of settlements and fortifications localized in and around the mound known today as Tel Afek/Râs el-'Ain in Israel. The mound itself is dominated today by the remains of an Ottoman fort, built on Crusader foundations, but an excavated Roman-era odeon can also be seen.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Ras el-Ain/Rosh Ha-Ayin
